mapper.select: select * from cashbook where id = #{id} order by day
mapper.insert: insert into cashbook values(seq_cb_idx.nextVal, #{content}, #{income, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{expense, jdbcType=INTEGER}, CURRENT_DATE, #{id})
mapper.update: update cashbook set content=#{content, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, income=#{income, jdbcType=INTEGER} where idx=#{idx}
